verses.verse: בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <S%H8066><s%> In the eighth בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> in the second לְדָרְיָ֑וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> of Darius הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> came the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זְכַרְיָה֙ <S%H2148><s%> unto Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בֶּ֣רֶכְיָ֔ה <S%H1296><s%> of Berechiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עִדּ֥וֹ <S%H5714><s%> of Iddo הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying
קָצַ֧ף <S%H7107><s%> displeased יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> with your fathers קָֽצֶף׃ <S%H7110><s%> hath been sore

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> Therefore say אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> thou unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ye unto me saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְאָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> and I will turn אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to you אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> unto you saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> not be like כַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֡ם <S%H1><s%> Be ye not as your fathers אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to whom קָרְאֽוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> have cried אֲלֵיהֶם֩ <S%H413><s%> about הַנְּבִיאִ֨ים <S%H5030><s%> prophets הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֜ים <S%H7223><s%> unto whom the former לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שׁ֤וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H1870><s%> ways הָרָעִ֔ים <S%H7451><s%> ye now from your evil [וּמַעֲלִילֵיכֶם כ] (וּמַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4611><s%> doing ק) הָֽרָעִ֑ים <S%H7451><s%> and [from] your evil וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמְע֛וּ <S%H8085><s%> but they did not hear וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or הִקְשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> nor hearken אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> Your fathers אַיֵּה־ <S%H346><s%> where הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> are they וְהַ֨נְּבִאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> where [are] they? and the prophets הַלְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> alway יִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <S%H2421><s%> do they live

אַ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H389><s%> but דְּבָרַ֣י <S%H1697><s%> But my words וְחֻקַּ֗י <S%H2706><s%> and my statutes אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֙יתִי֙ <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדַ֣י <S%H5650><s%> my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not הִשִּׂ֖יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> did they not take hold אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> fathers וַיָּשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> break וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and said כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which זָמַ֜ם <S%H2161><s%> thought יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Like as the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לָ֔נוּ כִּדְרָכֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1870><s%> unto us according to our ways וּכְמַ֣עֲלָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H4611><s%> and according to our doings כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> so hath he dealt אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H854><s%> for ס

בְּיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> day עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֜ה <S%H702><s%> Upon the four לְעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> eleven עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten חֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> month הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> which חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> which [is] the month שְׁבָ֔ט <S%H7627><s%> Sebat בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> in the second לְדָרְיָ֑וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> of Darius הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> came the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זְכַרְיָה֙ <S%H2148><s%> unto Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בֶּ֣רֶכְיָ֔הוּ <S%H1296><s%> of Berechiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עִדּ֥וֹא <S%H5714><s%> of Iddo הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

רָאִ֣יתִי ׀ <S%H7200><s%> I saw הַלַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> and behold a man רֹכֵב֙ <S%H7392><s%> riding עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and ס֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> horse אָדֹ֔ם <S%H122><s%> upon a red וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he עֹמֵ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> and he stood בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among הַהֲדַסִּ֖ים <S%H1918><s%> among the myrtle trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּמְּצֻלָ֑ה <S%H4699><s%> that [were] in the bottom וְאַחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> and behind סוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> horses אֲדֻמִּ֔ים <S%H122><s%> him [were there] red שְׂרֻקִּ֖ים <S%H8320><s%> speckled וּלְבָנִֽים׃ <S%H3836><s%> and white

וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Then said מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> I O my lord וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> with me said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about הַמַּלְאָךְ֙ <S%H4397><s%> what [are] these? And the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּ֔י אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אַרְאֶ֖ךָּ <S%H7200><s%> unto me I will shew מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> what הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַיַּ֗עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man הָעֹמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> that stood בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> among הַהֲדַסִּ֖ים <S%H1918><s%> among the myrtle trees וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> hath sent יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> These [are they] whom the LORD לְהִתְהַלֵּ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> to walk בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> to and fro through the earth

וַֽיַּעֲנ֞וּ <S%H6030><s%> And they answered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> the angel יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God הָֽעֹמֵד֙ <S%H5975><s%> that stood בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among הַהֲדַסִּ֔ים <S%H1918><s%> among the myrtle trees וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and said הִתְהַלַּ֣כְנוּ <S%H1980><s%> We have walked to and fro בָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through the earth וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and behold all the earth יֹשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> sitteth still וְשֹׁקָֽטֶת׃ <S%H8252><s%> and is at rest

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered מַלְאַךְ־ <S%H4397><s%> Then the angel יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> and said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֗י <S%H4970><s%> how אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תְרַחֵ֣ם <S%H7355><s%> how long wilt thou not have mercy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> on Jerusalem וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> and on the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which זָעַ֔מְתָּה <S%H2194><s%> against which thou hast had indignation זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> these שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> these threescore and ten שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> whole age

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <S%H4397><s%> the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּ֖י דְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> words טוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> with me [with] good דְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> words נִחֻמִֽים׃ <S%H5150><s%> [and] comfortable

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> with me said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about הַמַּלְאָךְ֙ <S%H4397><s%> So the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that communed בִּ֔י קְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> unto me Cry לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> thou saying כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts קִנֵּ֧אתִי <S%H7065><s%> I am jealous לִירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> for Jerusalem וּלְצִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> and for Zion קִנְאָ֥ה <S%H7068><s%> jealousy גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> with a great

וְקֶ֤צֶף <S%H7110><s%> sore גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> And I am very אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I קֹצֵ֔ף <S%H7107><s%> displeased עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> with the heathen הַשַּֽׁאֲנַנִּ֑ים <S%H7600><s%> [that are] at ease אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I קָצַ֣פְתִּי <S%H7107><s%> displeased מְּעָ֔ט <S%H4592><s%> for I was but a little וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they עָזְר֥וּ <S%H5826><s%> and they helped לְרָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> forward the affliction

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שַׁ֤בְתִּי <S%H7725><s%> I am returned לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem בְּֽרַחֲמִ֔ים <S%H7356><s%> with mercies בֵּיתִי֙ <S%H1004><s%> my house יִבָּ֣נֶה <S%H1129><s%> shall be built בָּ֔הּ נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> in it saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts [וְקָוָה כ] (וְקָ֥ו <S%H6961><s%> line ק) יִנָּטֶ֖ה <S%H5186><s%> shall be stretched forth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> upon Jerusalem

ע֣וֹד ׀ <S%H5750><s%> Again קְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> Cry לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> yet saying כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> will again תְּפוּצֶ֥ינָה <S%H6327><s%> shall yet be spread abroad עָרַ֖י <S%H5892><s%> My cities מִטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> through prosperity וְנִחַ֨ם <S%H5162><s%> shall yet comfort יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> will again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion וּבָחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> and shall yet choose ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> and again בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem ס

וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> Then lifted I up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינַ֖י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes וָאֵ֑רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and saw וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> and behold four קְרָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H7161><s%> horns

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And I said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <S%H4397><s%> unto the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּ֖י מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> with me What [be] these? And he answered אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַקְּרָנוֹת֙ <S%H7161><s%> me These [are] the horns אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which זֵר֣וּ <S%H2219><s%> which have scattered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וִירוּשָׁלָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem ס
